title: Lord, We Treasure With Affection
author: M. W. Biggs; Chorus by Witness Lee (1905-1997)
presentation: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

v1: All Thy path of sorrow here,
And those closing scenes of anguish
v2: Deep Thy sorrow then, Lord Jesus,
Deeper far than thought can reach;
Far beyond all tongues to teach.
v3: None could follow there, blest Savior,
v4: Thou didst measure then sin's distance,
Darkness, wrath and curse were Thine;
Thus we learn Thy love divine!
c1: We will praise Thee! We will praise Thee!
Praise Thee, Lord, for sinners slain!
Give Thee glory! Give Thee glory!
Give Thee glory for the life we gain!
